description:
Regent Leather Extrait De Parfum - A Masterpiece of Refined Luxury

Experience the commanding presence of Regent Leather, an exceptional extrait de parfum that embodies sophisticated masculinity with its rich, leathery character. This 50ml treasure from Thameen stands as a testament to the art of luxury perfumery, delivering an unforgettable olfactory experience that lingers with remarkable longevity. âœ¨

Product Information

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
50ml Unisex (Masculine Leaning) Fragrance Extrait de Parfum Thameen

Regent Leather Fragrance Profile

Top Notes Heart Notes Base Notes
Bergamot, Pink Pepper, Saffron Rose, Jasmine, Orris Leather, Oud, Amber, Sandalwood, Vanilla

Key Features of Regent Leather Extrait

  • ðŸ’Ž Premium extrait de parfum concentration for exceptional longevity
  • ðŸ”¥ Distinctive leather accord masterfully balanced with precious woods
  • ðŸŒ¿ Rare ingredients including genuine saffron and orris root
  • âœ¨ Sophisticated dry-down revealing complex amber and vanilla nuances
  • ðŸ’« Elegant glass bottle with regal detailing and gold accents

The journey of Regent Leather begins with a vibrant burst of bergamot and the distinctive spiciness of pink pepper, elevated by the golden warmth of precious saffron. As it evolves, the heart reveals an exquisite floral arrangement of rose and jasmine, complemented by the powdery elegance of orris. The true masterpiece emerges in the base, where a luxurious leather accord intertwines with smoky oud, creamy sandalwood, and the sensual embrace of amber and vanilla. ðŸŒ¸

The Heritage Behind Regent Leather

Thameen, whose name means "precious" in Arabic, has established itself as a prestigious niche perfume house that bridges Eastern opulence with Western refinement. Regent Leather draws inspiration from the historic leather-bound volumes in Britain's royal libraries, capturing both the scholarly elegance and aristocratic heritage in a bottle. Each component is meticulously sourced and blended by master perfumers to create this signature fragrance that stands as one of the brand's most acclaimed creations.

Frequently Asked Question

Q: How long does Regent Leather Extrait de Parfum last on skin?
A: As a true extrait de parfum (the highest concentration in perfumery), Regent Leather delivers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 10-12 hours on skin. The leather notes in particular have remarkable staying power, while the sillage remains moderate to strong, creating a sophisticated presence without overwhelming. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on well-moisturized skin. ðŸ’Ž

Elevate your fragrance collection with Regent Leather Extrait De Parfum - where timeless elegance meets modern sophistication in a truly unforgettable olfactory masterpiece. ðŸ”¥
short_description: Discover Regent Leather Extrait De Parfum, a sophisticated blend of premium leather, precious woods, and exotic spices. This luxurious 50ml fragrance by Thameen delivers remarkable longevity with its rich saffron opening, floral heart, and sumptuous leather-oud base. An olfactory masterpiece for discerning connoisseurs.
